name: Retrotron 3000
description: Retrotron 3000 is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its cat-like box body, soldier arms and legs, and a screen displaying a mesmerizing red and black color pattern, Retrotron 3000 is a true embodiment of nostalgia and technological prowess. Equipped with a pair of stylish glasses as an add-on, this robot stands out among its peers.
